title: Daily Wire Backstage: Censor This!!!
description:
As the dust settles on the Left's latest attempts to silence conservatives on social media platforms, many on the Right are feeling the walls closing in. Is the demonetization of Steven Crowder's channel just the beginning?Can conservatives expect more of the same from Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram? What can be done to thwart the suppression of Right-leaning content by Big Tech Leftists? 



Join this roundtable discussion featuring @Ben Shapiro, @Andrew Klavan, @Michael Knowles, Daily Wire god-king Jeremy Boreing, and special guest @Dave Rubin as they get to the bottom of these questions and more. 



Become a Daily Wire subscriber! https://www.dailywire.com/subscribe/premium?utm_source=social&utm_campaign=backstage
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
